properties.Script Body:
import re
from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils
import json

class ModifyFlowFile(StreamCallback):
    def process(self, inputStream, outputStream):
        # Read the input JSON
        input_json = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, 'UTF-8')
        data = json.loads(input_json)
        
        # Generate callsign for each record
        for record in data:
            if record.get("name"):
                # Lowercase and concatenate the words from the "name" field
                name = record.get("name", "")
                record["callsign"] = "".join(re.findall(r'\w+', name.lower()))
        
        # Write the updated JSON back
        outputStream.write(json.dumps(data).encode('UTF-8'))

flowFile = session.get()
if flowFile is not None:
    flowFile = session.write(flowFile, ModifyFlowFile())
    session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

import re
from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils
import json

class ModifyFlowFile(StreamCallback):
    def process(self, inputStream, outputStream):
        # Read the input JSON
        input_json = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, 'UTF-8')
        data = json.loads(input_json)
        
        # Generate IATA codes for missing entries
        for record in data:
            if not record.get("iata"):
                # Extract first letters of each word in the "name" field
                name = record.get("name", "")
                record["iata"] = "".join([word[0].upper() for word in re.findall(r'\w+', name)])[:3]
        
        # Write the updated JSON back
        outputStream.write(json.dumps(data).encode('UTF-8'))

flowFile = session.get()
if flowFile is not None:
    flowFile = session.write(flowFile, ModifyFlowFile())
    session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

properties.Script Body:
import re
from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils
import json

class ModifyFlowFile(StreamCallback):
    def process(self, inputStream, outputStream):
        # Read the input JSON
        input_json = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, 'UTF-8')
        data = json.loads(input_json)
        
        # Set alias for each record
        for record in data:
            if record.get("name"):
                # Lowercase and concatenate the words from the "name" field
                name = record.get("name", "")
                record["alias"] = "".join(re.findall(r'\w+', name.lower()))
        
        # Write the updated JSON back
        outputStream.write(json.dumps(data).encode('UTF-8'))

flowFile = session.get()
if flowFile is not None:
    flowFile = session.write(flowFile, ModifyFlowFile())
    session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
